records.Name: Peninsula State Park
records.General_Notes__c: Lots of trails, Sites a bit small.

records.Name: North Wood County
records.General_Notes__c: A little wet at times, best sites may be north loop however a noisy site is there

records.Name: Arbor Vitae Campground
records.General_Notes__c: Only a couple of good sites. Close to the lake, could carry kayaks.

records.Name: Willow River State Park
records.General_Notes__c: OK bathrooms, No Showers. Nice trails. Only one dumping station.

records.Name: Copper Falls
records.General_Notes__c: Most sites have enough room, right side may be quieter and stay towards lower numbering to have quieter neighbors since other sites will have lots of kids.

records.Name: Devils Lake State Park
records.General_Notes__c: Near Madison, lots of college kids. Nice hike around lake.
